languages.text: ...извлек{mf||ла} знакомый мне радужный клинок, который, словно по чьему-то приказу, вонзил{mf||а} в ближайшего сервитора!

traits.locale_text: ...извлек{mf||ла} знакомый мне радужный клинок, который, словно по чьему-то приказу, вонзил{mf||а} в ближайшего сервитора!

languages.text: ...suddenly drew an iridescent blade, one I had seen before, and, as if following some unheard command, plunged it into the nearest servitor!
languages.original_text: ...извлек{mf||ла} знакомый мне радужный клинок, который, словно по чьему-то приказу, вонзил{mf||а} в ближайшего сервитора!

traits.locale_text: ...suddenly drew an iridescent blade, one I had seen before, and, as if following another's behest, plunged it into the nearest servitor!
...suddenly drew an iridescent blade, one I had seen before, and, as if following another's behest, plunged it into the nearest servitor!
...suddenly drew an iridescent blade, one I had seen before, and, as if following some unheard command, plunged it into the nearest servitor!
...suddenly drew an iridescent blade, one I had seen before, and, as if following some unheard command, plunged it into the nearest servitor!
...suddenly drew an iridescent blade, one I had seen before, and, as if following some unheard command, plunged it into the nearest servitor!

languages.text: …突然、私が以前に目にしたイリディセントの刃物を抜き、聞こえない命令に従うかのように、最も近くのサーヴィターに突き刺した！
languages.original_text: ...suddenly drew an iridescent blade, one I had seen before, and, as if following some unheard command, plunged it into the nearest servitor!

traits.locale_text: …突然、私が以前に目にしたイリディセントの刃物を抜き、聞こえない命令に従うかのように、最も近くのサーヴィターに突き刺した！

languages.text: ... tira soudain une lame iridescente qui ne m'était pas étrangère et, comme pour obéir à un ordre inaudible, la plongea dans le servitor le plus proche !
languages.original_text: ...suddenly drew an iridescent blade, one I had seen before, and, as if following some unheard command, plunged it into the nearest servitor!

traits.locale_text: ... tira soudain une lame iridescente qui ne m'était pas étrangère et, comme pour obéir à un ordre inaudible, la plongea dans le servitor le plus proche !

languages.text: ……突然抽出了一把我曾经见过的虹色刀片，就好像听到了什么别人听不到的命令一样，一刀插在了离{mf|他|她}最近的机仆身上！
languages.original_text: ...suddenly drew an iridescent blade, one I had seen before, and, as if following some unheard command, plunged it into the nearest servitor!

traits.locale_text: ……突然抽出了一把我曾经见过的虹色刀片，就好像听到了什么别人听不到的命令一样，一刀插在了离{mf|他|她}最近的奴工身上！

languages.text: ... ¡desenvainó de repente una espada iridiscente, una que ya había visto antes, y, como siguiendo una orden silenciosa, la clavó en el servidor más cercano!
languages.original_text: ...suddenly drew an iridescent blade, one I had seen before, and, as if following some unheard command, plunged it into the nearest servitor!

traits.locale_text: ... ¡desenvainó de repente una espada iridiscente, una que ya había visto antes, y, como siguiendo una orden silenciosa, la clavó en el servidor más cercano!

languages.text: ... zog plötzlich eine leuchtende Klinge, die ich noch nie gesehen hatte, und rammte sie wie auf einen stummen Befehl hin in den nächsten Servitor!
languages.original_text: ...suddenly drew an iridescent blade, one I had seen before, and, as if following some unheard command, plunged it into the nearest servitor!

traits.locale_text: ... zog plötzlich eine leuchtende Klinge, die ich noch nie gesehen hatte, und rammte sie wie auf einen stummen Befehl hin in den nächsten Servitor!

languages.text: ...Daha önce de gördüğüm yanardöner bıçağını çekip bizlerin duyamadığı bir emre itaat edercesine en yakınındaki hizmetöre sapladı!
languages.original_text: ...suddenly drew an iridescent blade, one I had seen before, and, as if following some unheard command, plunged it into the nearest servitor!

traits.locale_text: ...daha önce de gördüğüm yanardöner bıçağını çekip bizlerin duyamadığı bir emre itaat edercesine en yakınındaki servitöre sapladı!
